title: A MASTERCLASS On How To Prepare & Thrive In Recession EP 1293
description:
Today’s episode is a masterclass around finance, with three experts on the topic of money and the mindset you should have around it to help you prepare and thrive during financial hardships.

In this episode,

  • Jaspreet Singh, also known as ‘The Minority Mindset’, tells us what he wishes we were all taught about money.
  • Billionaire Ray Dalio shares the his opinion on the most common investing mistakes people make.
  • Rachel Rodgers, the founder of Hello Seven, explains why we need to be having different conversations around money.


For more, go to lewishowes.com/1293

Full Episodes:

Jaspreet Singh - https://link.chtbl.com/1257-pod

Ray Dalio - https://link.chtbl.com/1266-pod

Rachel Rodgers - https://link.chtbl.com/1183-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
